summary: Standalone: Thor's Hammer - Mjölnir, Mjöllnir, Mjolnir, Mjölner, Mjølner or Mjölnar.
descriptionHtml:
[center]I've quit modding and moved on to social work and game programming.
As a final gift: [b] ALL MY ASSETS ARE FREE TO USE[/b]
For further details and constraints, please check out the board thread:
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1779275-time-to-say-good-bye-and-a-little-gift/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1779275-time-to-say-good-bye-and-a-little-gift[/url]
Cheerio and keep on playing![/center]


[b]NEW VERSION HERE: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9196/?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9196/?[/url][/b]


Installation:

Copy textures and meshes folder and Mjolnir.esp to your Skyrimdata directory.

The folder-structure should look like:
... SkyrimdatatexturesweaponsMjolnirMjolnir.dds | Mjolnir_m.dds | Mjolnir_n.dds
... SkyrimdatameshesweaponsMjolnir1stpersonMjolnir.nif | Mjolnir.nif
... SkyrimdataMjolnir.esp

Make sure that the plugin is activated in startmenu|DATA FILES.
The hammer is placed in the forge-menu along with the Daedric-items.
Cheap to craft for instant access

To uninstall just delete the extracted files.
This is my first standalone weapon, if you experience any problems pls report back.

This item was made by user request, the textures aren't perfect 'cause i have to save up time for my own creations - but it should work.


Thx & have fun!
author: Ghosu
